name: adorably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you love or like something or someone, usually because they are attractive and often small: The puppy has the most adorably cute little face. At the end of the film, they make up rather adorably and are last seen dancing together in silhouette.
More examplesFewer examplesShe plays an adorably quirky librarian who influences the lives of the people who visit the library.Their four year-old adorably asked if she could take my coat for me when I arrived.He couldn't take his eyes off the girl, who he declared to be the most adorably beautiful creature he had ever seen.
